name: 1979 Invasion Earth
description: 1979 Invasion Earth is a compilation of four Casual Arcade Shooter games based on a classic retro games from when i was a young lad..
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 1 GHz or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 graphics device DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 160 MB available space
